name: matsubg
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(csg, c3), cfv(csg, c4)))

stmt.origin: grpsubpropd(c3, c4, wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2)))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(csg, c3), cfv(csg, c4)))

-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, c4)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c4)))
-| wceq(c4, co(c0, cmat, c1))
-| wceq(c3, co(c1, cfrlm, cxp(c0, c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(Base ` c3)=(Base ` c4))
⊣ c4 =(c0[Mat]c1)
⊣ c3 =(c1[freeLMod](c0 × c0))

comment: The matrix ring has the same addition as its underlying group. (Contributed by AV, 2-Aug-2019.)
